record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name=NULL and term="Record Add command panel" and format.name="radd" and syslanguage="en"
record.recordid: Record Add command panel - radd - en
record.format.name: radd

brief.brief: The Record Add command panel adds a record to the database.

detail.detail: Record: (file variable) Specify the record variable to add.
Exit if Record Contains All Null Keys: (label) Specify the exit to take if all keys in the record are null.
Exit if Record Contains Invalid Null Keys: (label) Specify the exit to take if the record contains an invalid null key.
Exit if Record Contains Invalid Duplicate Keys: (label) Specify the exit to take if the record contains an invalid duplicate key.
Before you can add a record to a table, you must the fill in the key fields correctly.
